description:
Summary score from Patient Health Questionnaire 8-item, where higher scores indicate a lower quality of life. [Kroenke K et al. 2001 (PubMED ID: 11556941)](10.1046/j.1525-1497.2001.016009606.x)

[Search for all PHQ-8 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/abc/variables?search=phq8)
calculation: phq8_interest + phq8_down_hopeless + phq8_sleep + phq8_tired + phq8_appetite + phq8_bad_failure + phq8_troubleconcentrating + phq8_movingslowly
